question.title: Question
question.description: What is the primary hormone involved in the adrenarche phase of puberty?

option_a.title: Option A
option_a.description: Testosterone, which is primarily involved in male puberty

option_b.title: Option B
option_b.description: Estrogen, which is primarily involved in female puberty

option_c.title: Option C
option_c.description: DHEA-Sulfate, a hormone that is the first to increase during adrenarche

option_d.title: Option D
option_d.description: Insulin, a hormone involved in glucose metabolism
